actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Joint resolution to repeal the joint resolution expressing the determination of the United States with respect to the situation in Cuba, approved October 3, 1962.

summary.text: Repeals the joint resolution expressing the determination of the United States with respect to the situation in Cuba, approved October 3, 1962 (known as the Cuban Resolution).

titles.title: Joint resolution to repeal the joint resolution expressing the determination of the United States with respect to the situation in Cuba, approved October 3, 1962.
